app - package app
Root package for the Parade game.
App - Class in app
Main class to run and manage the game application.
App() - Constructor for class app.App
Default constructor for initializing the application.
app.entity - package app.entity
Contains classes representing human and bot entities within the game, including their attributes.
app.game - package app.game
Contains classes for managing the gameplay.
app.network - package app.network
This package contains the classes that help to connect and run the game online.
app.resource - package app.resource
This package contains the resources classes such as cards and decks and the parade.
app.utilities - package app.utilities
This package contains utility classes that help print the game elements.
AppUtils - Class in app.utilities
Helper class to generate Bot players to add to the game

default constructor
askForCard(Scanner, ArrayList<Card>) - Static method in class app.utilities.Input
Prompts the user to select a card from their hand by entering a number representing the card's position in playerHand.

Prompts the user to discard a card from their hand by entering a number representing the card's position in playerHand.
askForNumberOfPlayers(Scanner) - Static method in class app.utilities.Input
Prompt the user to enter how many human and bot players for the game.

D

Deck - Class in app.resource
Represents a deck of cards used in the game.
Deck() - Constructor for class app.resource.Deck
Constructor for a new deck of 66 unique cards, with 11 cards for each of the 6 colors from 0-10.
determineCardChoice(Game) - Method in class app.entity.BotPlayer
Bot Algorithm: This simple algorithm is aimed at collecting the least amount cards from the parade as possible The bot evaluates each card in its hand and selects the one that results in the fewest removals from the parade.
determineWinner() - Method in class app.game.Game
Determines the winner of the game by counting points.

drawCard() - Method in class app.resource.Deck

Instance method for clientHandler to send message to a client
sendMessage(Scanner) - Method in class app.network.Client
To send a message to the game server The game server will send a message to activate the client to actually send a response to the server, else it will discard any other input
